Package utils.access.op

Package containing helper classes to execute mongo queries on in memory records

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Condition
    Condition in a mongo query
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndCondition
    "And" operator for mongo expressions
    CompareCondition
    A comparison operator for mongo expressions
    EqualsSingleValueCondition
    check if object is equal to a fixed value
    FieldAccess
    Field access operator for mongo conditions
